name: SHIFT (itch)
description:
SHIFT is a colorful, lightning-paced, dodge-crazy FPS featuring cute, chunky robots hell-bent on spazzing you out with their 'lazerz'.

SHIFT was created by Shawn Beck for 7DFPS 2014.

Follow me on Twitter : @shawnbecktp

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING?

"SHIFT challenges you to race through mazes of tight corridors, teleporting through laser gates and deftly evading turret fire. It's fast, frenetic, and fun." - IndieGameEnthusiast

"A game that is extremely adorable and equally merciless" - Softpedia

"Your machine may or may not handle this much pew pew."
(This game was not optimized in any way)
- Oliver Yeung
